name: Alex Stamos
background: Former CSO of Facebook and Yahoo. Stanford professor. Founding partner at Krebs Stamos Group. Led response to Russian election interference. Expert in large-scale security operations.

principles.name: Security at scale requires different thinking
principles.description: Enterprise security doesn't scale to billions of users. Consumer security requires automation, defaults, and accepting that most users won't take action. Design for the non-expert.
principles.falsification: When user education programs demonstrably improve security at scale

principles.name: Nation-state adversaries change the game
principles.description: When your threat model includes nation-states, normal security isn't enough. Assume compromise. Focus on detection and limiting damage, not just prevention.
principles.falsification: When organizations successfully prevent all nation-state attacks

principles.name: Trust and safety is security
principles.description: Abuse, misinformation, harassmentâ€”these are security problems. Platform security isn't just about technical attacks. Protect users from each other.
principles.falsification: When pure technical security provides sufficient user protection
